Posts.Content: ConfusedZee wrote: I can’t believe I am back on these boards asking questions. I had a scare in 2012, turned out I have fibrocystic breast. However, now that same left breast is bothering me again. I had a clear discharge out of my left nipple when I was sitting and working from home. I did a self exam I noticed an indentation on the lower side of my left Breast when I raise my arm. I made an appt with by obgyn for Monday. I don’t want to tell anyone this time becuase I had everyone worried last time I had a scare. I had my first scare with the same Breast 6 years ago. I am 38 now! Ugh I just want to know if anyone else had these symptoms and what their prognosis is/was? Log in to post a reply

Posts.Content: Jan 11, 2012 08:38PM ConfusedZee wrote: I am sorry about your situation. Can you try to research a doctor in you area? The OBGYN can also see you and yes that would get you in faster. After the docot does a breast exam they will send you to get a mammo and Ultrasound. I have a lump on my left breast and when I went to see my primary doc she felt it too and she felt swollen lymph nodes under my armpit; she sent me for both q mammo and ultrasound and they couldn't see anything and my doc said it's fibrocystic. I changed doc and my second doc said the same, but with my persistence referred me to a breast surgeon, which I will see on the 24th. These forums help and your not alone! My advice is see an OBGYN and get the necessary tests done so when it's time to see the specialist the test results are in and they don't make you wait for another appt with a specialist few more months down. I hope this helps, but I am in the same boat and still will not settle until a biopsy confirms fibrocystic. Good luck and just be prepared for the specialist with your test results, it's one step at a time.
